name: Commando Strike 3D - Free FPS War Action Game
name_original: Commando Strike 3D - Free FPS War Action Game
description:
As an elite Commando Officer, you have been given a mission to clear a remote enemy camp with limited weapons and limited time. You are expected to succeed at all costs.

Your Mission:

You have been dropped at night near a secret enemy camp. The Mission assigned to you directly from the GHQ is to enter enemy camp, clear the small enemy unit that will try to protect the camp. You will be encountered by enemy soldiers at each checkpoint and you have to kill them and move step by step. Destroy all important enemy assets including Fuel and Ammunition dumps and military vehicles. And get hold a red box of classified enemy documents hidden some where in the camp. You might be attacked by enemy Gunship Helicopters or encounter mines or booby traps. You have limited ammo with you and its a daring mission which only the bravest of Commando elite can dare to accept. Wish you all the good luck.

How to Play:

- Touch & Drag the screen anywhere to move/rotate your gun left, right, up or down
- Tap Fire button at bottom right to fire any selected weapon
- Select any weapon during action: Light Machine Gun, Pistol or RPG (Rocket Propelled Gun)
- For enemy at far distance, use the Telescope for sniper shoot
- The weapons will reload itself but keep an eye on the number of bullets ... You have limited ammunition.

Features:

- FPS (First Person Shooter)
- Complete Battlefield real looking 3D environment
- Amazing Movie Quality sound effects and sound track
- Easy GUI and controls
- Enemy AI
- Efficient weapon control and selection
